mapper.select: select * from upm_org where _cascade like concat((select _cascade from upm_org t where t.id = #{id}), '%') order by idx
select * from upm_org where name like #{name} and _cascade like concat((select _cascade from upm_org t where t.id = #{currentOrgId}), '%')

select * from upm_org
where parent_id = #{id} or id = #{id}
where _cascade like concat((select _cascade from upm_org t where t.id = #{id}), '%')
order by _cascade, idx
mapper.update: update upm_org set is_leaf = 0 where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into upm_org(_code, name, full_name, remark, _cascade, type, parent_id, zip_code, addr, tel, tax, email, contacter, create_user_id, idx, status) values(#{code}, #{name}, #{fullName}, #{remark}, #{cascade}, #{type}, #{parentId}, #{zipCode}, #{addr}, #{tel}, #{tax}, #{email}, #{contacter}, #{createUserId}, #{idx}, #{status})
